data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Mirini from Argentina (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carpintero, Diego Leonardo, Chérot, Frédéric (2014): A new genus and species of Mirini from Argentina (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae). Zootaxa 3774 (4): 395-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.4.7
